PatientDetails.Name: Barbe L. Brown
HospitalCourse: Patient found unresponsive at home by her husband on 02/22/2025.
EMS initiated CPR and intubation; epinephrine was administered multiple times.
Arrived at the hospital in asystole and was pronounced dead at 2241 after resuscitation efforts were unsuccessful.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Deceased on 02/22/2025 due to cardiac arrest and asystole.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: No evidence of sepsis; patient died from cardiorespiratory arrest following advanced cardiac life support.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: No blood transfusion administered during this encounter.
